scenario.send:
NOTIFY sip:127.0.0.1:5070 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP 127.0.0.1:5070;branch=[branch] From: sip:127.0.0.1:5060;tag=TAG To: sip:127.0.0.1:5070 Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 NOTIFY Contact: sip:sipp@127.0.0.1:5060 Max-Forwards: 70 Event: telephone-event Content-Type: audio/telephone-event Content-Length: 4
\x01\x02\x03\x04

NOTIFY sip:127.0.0.1:5070 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP 127.0.0.1:5070;branch=[branch] From: sip:127.0.0.1:5060;tag=TAG To: sip:127.0.0.1:5070 Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 NOTIFY Contact: sip:sipp@127.0.0.1:5060 Max-Forwards: 70 Event: telephone-event Content-Type: audio/telephone-event Content-Length: 0 X-Last-Header: an-extra-crlf
